mapper.select: SELECT gc.userID, gc.boardNum, g.boardNum AS "gpurchase.boardNum", g.userID AS "gpurchase.userID", g.price AS "gpurchase.price", g.edate AS "gpurchase.edate", g.sdate AS "gpurchase.sdate", g.boardTitle AS "gpurchase.boardTitle" FROM GpurchaseCart gc, Gpurchase g WHERE gc.userID = g.userID AND gc.userID = #{userID} ORDER BY gc.boardNum
